resources.string: History Museum of Bosnia and Herzegovina deals with the collection, preservation, research, presentation and promotion of cultural and historical heritage of Bosnia and Herzegovina. In its seventy years’ history, he has gone through a series of transformations: from the name change, to changes in the structure and location.\n\n

Originated from the Museum of the Revolution of Bosnia and Herzegovina which has been aimed at history of the struggle against fascism in World War II, History Museum today talks about different topics and stages of Bosnian history - often through the eyes of time witnesses and through perspective of an ordinary man.\n\n

After the war 1992-1995, the museum, like other cultural institutions with state sign, remained outside of the legal framework and without regular financial support. The museum has survived thanks to the concept of its openness towards society and strengthening links with the community, offering public facilities by which the museum objects, stories and space talk about the past, present and future.\n\n

Museum is specific and unique building which was projected by Boris Magas, Edo Šmidihen and Radovan Horvat, which is a unique example of the international style in architecture. Its dominant cube and clean forms even today stand out in the panorama of the city of Sarajevo.\n\n

Admission:
 Adults: 5KM
 School groups: 2KM
 Persons
with disabilities: 1KM

“Even a modest donation will help keep the Louvre’s exceptional heritage alive. Thank you for your generosity, a true anchor of support for our projects.
Jean-Luc Martinez, President-Director of the Musée du Louvre

Individual support

 No matter how large or small, private donations are an important source of support for the History Museum. Your contribution will help us collect, preserve, and display cultural and historical heritage. One-time donations can be transferred to the Museum's bank account:

 Bank: Raiffeisen Bank d.d. Bosna i Hercegovina, Sarajevo
 Account no.: 1610000016710007
 IBAN: BA 391610000016710007
 SWIFT: RZBABA2S

Sponsors and partners

 Support the History Museum of Bosnia and Herzegovina as a sponsor or corporate partner by sponsoring the collection, preservation, and presentation of cultural and historical heritage. Sponsoring or partnering with one of the most highly regarded cultural institutions in the country will help you realise your philanthropic and business goals in line with the principles of social responsibility. The Museum offers different kinds of sponsorship and partnership: long-term support to departments, sections, collections, exhibitions, and exhibits. Depending on your affinities and abilities, you can opt for one or more forms of cooperation and support. For more details, contact our administrative offices by e-mail: hasimbegovic@muzej.ba, or call: + (387) 33/226 098.

Support the museum mobile application

 The History Museum mobile application offers not only basic information about its activities, but also unique insight into the museum’s collections. Visitors can take a virtual tour of departments and exhibitions. Exhibits are shown in high-resolution photographs. In addition, the mobile application will show artefacts that are not on display in permanent exhibitions, but that are kept in storage. Contribute to the enlargement of the Museum's virtual collection by making a private donation or via a sponsorship or partnership package!

Artefact donations

 The donation of historically significant artefacts has always been one of the main ways in which museums enlarge their collections. The History Museum of Bosnia and Herzegovina is no exception: we are happy to provide exceptional care for items you think may warrant scientific attention. If you have one or more such items which you would like to donate to the museum, please get in touch via e-mail: hasimbegovic@muzej.ba or phone: + (387) 33/226 098. Please do not deliver items (by mail or in person) before our curators have had a chance to assess them.
